mapper.select: select uem.user_id, -- 用户ID uem.entity_id, -- 企业ID om.reference_no, -- 购买的套餐名称 om.user_channel, -- 购买渠道 oa.appointment_cates, -- 体检类别1:一般体检预约(C端) 2:进阶体检预约(C端) 3:分布式体检预约(B端) 4:进阶体检预约(B端)5:家庭医生6.门诊绿通预约 oa.service_option, -- 服务选项(1:护士上门/2:指定地点) oa.time_from, -- 开始时间 address, -- 预约地址 oa.time_to, -- 完成时间 oa.status, -- 完成状态 oa.time_to as reportTime FROM user_entity_mapping as uem LEFT JOIN order_main as om ON uem.user_id=om.user_id LEFT JOIN order_appointment as oa ON uem.user_id=oa.user_id where uem.user_id=#{userId} and reference_no=#{referenceNo}
